alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued March 03 at 6:56AM EST until March 03 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY FOR THE EDGEWATER AREA EXTENDED UNTIL 9 AM... * WHAT...Visibility reduced to less then one quarter mile in a mixture of dense fog and smoke. * WHERE...The Edgewater area of Coastal Volusia County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM this morning. * IMPACTS...Extremely hazardous driving conditions due to near zero visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Reports from the Florida Highway Patrol and news media indicate localized, but very dense fog remaining in place around the Edgewater area, particularly near I-95. Persons should use extreme caution, or avoid driving in this area is possible. The fog is expected to slowly dissipate around 9 AM.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
